interactions.name: VolumeUI
interactions.description: Move the cursor to the right to increase the volume, and to the left to decrease it

interactions.name: VolumeMove
interactions.description: Shake up your device to increase the volume, and shake down to decrease it

interactions.name: MusicUI
interactions.description: Push the button to play or stop the music

interactions.name: ColorMove
interactions.description: Shake your device to change the light color
